title: Cameron Oliver sheriff office- records request

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the South Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Good Day. I hope you are doing well. 
I am requesting the following records from your agency.
 Can you please provide a list of deputies  currently employed by the sheriff office   by name and rank. Also by District. 
Drug crimes possession of all illegal drugs. 
I want a list of the suspects'  drugs charges and the deputy   who made the arrest. 
I want crime data on this crime from the years 2021-2025. 
Also, a list of the most frequent crimes your community faces. 

Let me know if you have any questions or concerns. 
I look forward to hearing from you. 
If possible please send all requested records by email. 
Thank you. 
Take care and be well. 

Best regards,
 Cameron Oliver 
904-489-9118
oliverkidsjax@gmail.com

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Cameron John Oliver
